TopicTitle: Thought on the parachute deploy bug

Articles.Content:
I had the parachute doesn't deploy/ impact at above terminal velocity bug again.

It got me thinking. If the atmospheric pressure value was erroneously low, you would observe these events because lower pressure results in higher speed, and parachutes deploy according to pressure.

10 hours ago, Superluminaut said:

I had the parachute doesn't deploy/ impact at above terminal velocity bug again.

It got me thinking. If the atmospheric pressure value was erroneously low, you would observe these events because lower pressure results in higher speed, and parachutes deploy according to pressure.

I dont mind velocity bug as long as parachute bug exists, and i land to water  :,D
